messages.subject: Hisikari Clan...Satsuma
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I am trying to find info on the Hisikari Clan of Sstsuma, and haven t had much luck with Google. Are any members familiar with this clan, or possibly
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
I am trying to find info on the Hisikari Clan of Sstsuma, and haven't
had much luck with Google. Are any members familiar with this clan, or
possibly point me in the right direction? Would like to find info on
lineage especially from the mid 1600s to early 1700s....thanks
